info.brief_description: All fetishes and basiclly everything else goes
info.description:
This is a world filled with monsters, plants, and magic or anything else that can be thought of for fetishes everything is welcome but please follow a few rules
The 2 main characters are devlon a male blond hair blue eyes loves inflating himself and his wife age 20
Jenny female brown hair brown eyes and C cup breasts and a little bit of a belly she has a foot and a fart fetish and loves anything huge in her for as long as possible and always wanted to be pregnant with as many children as possible and loves belly inflation but hates the others sometimes will do it for her husband
These two charecters are married and are both 20 years old and have taken a potion that let's them live forever never aging
The world they live in is a mix of modern and medieval with monsters magic and anything you can think off both devlon and Jenny are bi devlon has no problem being with other people while Jenny never really liked the idea
You can add as many people as you want all I ask is don't kill the main characters and don't make them act out of character
